items.dash_confirm_updategroup: Do you want to update this group?
items.dash_confirm_creategroup_1: Do you want to create group
items.topnav_confirm_exit:
Do you want to exit Kaiku backroom?
Unsaved changes will not be committed.
items.help_content_1: You can find all users from 'Global' group chat.
items.help_content_2: You can find Main menu from the right side of your profile.
items.help_content_3: You can edit your profile by clicking your profile picture in left upper corner or using the Main menu.
items.help_content_4: In profile edit page you can overwrite you pre-filled fields. Remember to press 'save' when you are done.
items.help_content_5: The chat view shows your already started conversations. To start a new conversation, select a person in a group or search for the with the 'search' bar.
items.help_content_6: You can view other users' profiles by clicking any user in any view and selecting 'View profile'.
items.help_content_7: Chats, view profil and edit profile-page are panels stacked on the right side of the app. (Stacked in order listed).
items.help_content_8: You can access lower panels by closing the panels on top.
items.help_content_9: Psst! you can always find me from the Main menu when needed.
items.help_content_10: You can hide the help button by pressing the 'hide' button.
items.admin_help_content_1: You can display all users by clicking "All users" from side navigation.
items.admin_help_content_2: You can display all groups by clicking "All groups" from side navigation.
items.admin_help_content_3: New user can be added from side navigation link "New user". You can also find this link from right top corner below top navigation.
items.admin_help_content_4: New group can be added from side navigation link "New group". You can also find this link from right top corner below top navigation.
items.admin_help_content_5: You can edit user from "All users" page. Find the user from the list. In row in which user is, click edit-button. When changes are made, remember hit the save button.
items.admin_help_content_6: You can edit group from "All groups" page. Find the group from the list. In row in which group is, click edit-button. When changes are made, remember hit the save button.
items.admin_help_content_7: You can delete user from "All users" page. Find the user from the list. In row in which user is, click delete-button. Confirm your actions from dialogue.
items.admin_help_content_8: You can delete group from "All groups" page. Find the group from the list. In row in which group is, click delete-button. Confirm your actions from dialogue.
